name: Project Thunderbird
description:
Part of Nordic Game Jam 2023

A rail shooter where the player flies a spaceship through an enemy blockade, shoot the enemies and don’t get hit.

The game is intended to be used with the custom Lego ship controller we created using the official Lego Kit.

Made by:

Emanuel Perpåls - Project Lead

Max Tollebäck - Sound Design

Milton Sundgren - 3D Artist

Fredrik Borg - Level Design & Animation

Tobias Løfgren - Programmer

Hjalte Sorgenfrei Mac Dalland - Programmer

Orchestration is "Epic Orchestra" by Joshua Empyre
